#summary &ccedil character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &ccedil

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ccedil;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c7/index.htm U+000C7].
  * `&Ccedil` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c7/index.htm U+000C7].
  * `&ccedil;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e7/index.htm U+000E7].
  * `&ccedil` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e7/index.htm U+000E7].
